ygData.subject: Re: Sources of combine weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: What did you mean by not stacking them?  I havent tried the quests im just curious to what you mean. Thanks Phil
ygData.messageBody:
What did you mean by not stacking them? I havent tried the quests im just
curious to what you mean.

Thanks Phil

grei@... wrote:

> From: grei@...
>
> > From: BrainBoss@...
> >
> > With today's patch, several new bard quests were implemented. Most (if not
> > all) of them entail running packages from bard agents to other bard agents,
> > though.
> >
> > Amhran Fasach
> > Fennin Ro
>
> Just don't stack the quests. I did that and by the time I made it from
> Kelethin to Freeport, all I got was a 'Thank you very much' instead of
> the adjustments, xp, and cash.
>
> Grei
> Bristlebane
>

> Suddenly and embarrassingly, Grei's swash came unbuckled...
